original:
Hydrothermal vents are underwater features that emit heated water enriched with minerals. Scientists are exploring the potential role of these environments in the origin of life on Earth. It is hypothesized that hydrothermal vents may have provided the necessary energy and chemical building blocks for the emergence of life.
